title: vbetftn
author: vbetftn
content: vbetFTN.COM    Here we're back with another challenge     Good evening everyone,For the love of Argentina, we've decided to go for Liga Professional matches.The rules are the same and yet participation is the simplest.How to participate:- Predict the 1 / X / 2 of each match- Include your vbetFTN userID in your reply- One correct answer gets you +1 point to the leaderboard- Any participant who has the most correct answers takes the prize pool- For the tiebreaker guess the total goals scored for all the matches combinedRewards:- 1st: $50 free bet- 2nd: $30 free bet- 3rd: $20 free betMatches:- Tigre vs Banfield- Rosario Central vs Estudiantes L.P- Racing Club vs San Lorenzo- River Plate vs Colon Santa Fe- Arsenal Sarandi vs Defensa y Justicia- Union de Santa Fe vs Boca JuniorsGood luck to the best of the best!

comments.body: Ey guys i missed this one, but here its my thread about Argentine football, also for who dont know, im Argentinian (the only one in this section of the forum as far as i know). Really nice to see vbetftn making this with our league.Edit: i forgot to put my link to the thread. ARGENTINA FOOTBALL LEAGUE DISCUSSION THREAD

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: Quote from: Not your key not your BTC on July 06, 2023, 11:59:07 PMHere the results :- Tigre vs Banfield = 2- Rosario Central vs Estudiantes L.P = x- Racing Club vs San Lorenzo = x- River Plate vs Colon Santa Fe = 1- Arsenal Sarandi vs Defensa y Justicia = 2- Union de Santa Fe vs Boca Juniors = xTotal goals = 3 + 0 + 2 + 2 + 3+ 0 = 10 GoalsThere is just something about South American football and the draw but whatever the case wouldn't be any happy after finding myself on the podium Quote from: Not your key not your BTC on July 06, 2023, 11:59:07 PMthe winners: 1. cumakoff 4 Total goals = 122. Woodie 4 Total goals = 133. temple 4 total goals = 14I am not apart, just help vbetftnLooks like you are spot on with this , and interesting enough it was tied at first place and tiebreaker was triggered and total goals is what separated us...congrats @cumakoff and @temple We await official results from vbetftn

comments.author: vbetftn
comments.body: We would love to express gratitude to everyone who participated.A special shoutout to 'Not your key not your BTC' for their valuable support.We're excited to gradually become a part of the Argentine football communities (big thanks to darxiaomi).Looking forward to seeing you all soon!Winners:1st: cumakoff: 4 PTS // 12 Goals2nd: Woodie: 4 PTS // 13 Goals3rd:temple: 4 PTS // 14 Goals The rest of the leaderboard:Doell: 3 PTS // 14 GoalsAikidoka: 3 PTS // 16 Goalsshogun47: 2 PTSkomisariatku: 2 PTSNot your key not your BTC: 2 PTSmalcovi2: 1 PTSajiz138: 1 PTSP.S: Corresponding rewards will be credited to the winners within a few hours.Cheers,
